name: Facebook minus Likes/Reactions
description:
Removes the like button from facebook posts and comments, and from notifications.

This was something a friend of mine wanted. I'm going to try it out but I may not end up using it regularly myself, in which case this style may not stay maintained.

user.name: Malcolm Ocean
user.about:
I blog about culture, change, and metacognition at malcolmocean.com.

I help people achieve their goals with complice.co.
